imfweo 0.0.0.9000

Download and Process IMF WEO Data

weo_bulk.Rd

Download and Process IMF WEO Data

Usage

weo_bulk(year, release = c("Spring", "Fall"), file_path = NULL, quiet = FALSE)

Arguments

year

Numeric year of the WEO release (e.g., 2023)

release

Character or numeric: "Spring"/"Fall" or 1/2

file_path

Optional path to save downloaded file

quiet

Logical: whether to suppress messages

Value

A tibble containing WEO data in long format
